entry.title: Bitcoin masks for Satoshi Nakamoto cosplay

link.title: Bitcoin masks for Satoshi Nakamoto cosplay

entry.content:
Inspired by the cover of Newsweek’s now notorious return to print, I made a couple of bitcoin masks for mysterious Satoshi cosplay. In case it’s not obvious, that’s the bitcoin B on its side—a great look.

We actually made more than one mask. I think I like the one above, opera-glasses style, but there’s a flexible version that’s extra sparkly with elastic, too.
entry.summary: Inspired by the cover of Newsweek’s now notorious return to print, I made a couple of bitcoin masks for mysterious Satoshi cosplay. In case it’s not obvious, that’s the bitcoin B on its side—a great look.

entry.title: Cardboard Sutro Tower
entry.content:
I’ve been building IKEA furniture, which means I’ve got a lot of giant empty cardboard boxes sitting around my apartment. It seemed a waste to just throw it out, so I decided to make something out of it.

Here’s my attempt at a model of Sutro Tower made entirely out of cut corrugated cardboard. I’ve got a Dogme-like aversion to the use of adhesives or measuring devices, fueled in part by the fact that I don’t have any. Still, it sticks together pretty well, and is very sturdy, if a bit perpetually askew.

[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/IMG_20131020_111657-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2013/10/cardboard-sutro-tower/img_20131020_111657/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/IMG_20131020_111228-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2013/10/cardboard-sutro-tower/img_20131020_111228/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/IMG_20131020_111208-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2013/10/cardboard-sutro-tower/img_20131020_111208/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/IMG_20131020_111420-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2013/10/cardboard-sutro-tower/img_20131020_111420/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/IMG_20131020_111512-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2013/10/cardboard-sutro-tower/img_20131020_111512/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/IMG_20131020_111527-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2013/10/cardboard-sutro-tower/img_20131020_111527/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/IMG_20131020_111605-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2013/10/cardboard-sutro-tower/img_20131020_111605/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/IMG_20131020_115447-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2013/10/cardboard-sutro-tower/img_20131020_115447/)
